{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3649109,"name":"T.Krauter","username":"T.Krauter","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/t.krauter/{size}/8582_2.png","created_at":"2025-06-08T20:34:21.337Z","cooked":"

Team 4946, The Alpha Dogs is proud to present our key documents from the 2025 FRC season.

Firstly, the engineering report for our 2025 robot, Vortex. This report outlines the key components and decisions that went into the design, construction, and programming of the 2025 robot, along with some in-season projects.
Engineering Report 25’.pdf (49.8 MB)

Secondly, our business plan for the 2025 season. This document outlines our team practices, structure, and community initiatives.
2024- 2025 Business Plan.pdf (6.2 MB)

Previous version of these documents are available on our website

Thanks to the students, alumni, mentor, and sponsors who made this season the best one yet!
